title.narrative: The UK’s contribution to the EU Turkey Refugee Facility

description.narrative: This activity (The UK’s contribution to the EU Turkey Refugee Facility) is a component of The UK’s contribution to the Facility for Refugees in Turkey, FRIT 2 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £141,070,476. This component benefits Turkey, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Education facilities and training, Health policy and administrative management, Water supply and sanitation - large systems, Social Protection, Employment creation, Food assistance. , with the following implementing partners: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Cooperation and Development. The start date is 01-07-2019 and the end date is 31-12-2025.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Cooperation and Development
